features: Mops Focal Points: High-quality ABS material and a high-hardness aluminum mop rod make the hand feel more comfortable and last longer;Wall mounted designed, you can hang the laminate mop on the wall to save space for your room; Innovative 440 ML sealed water tank, say goodbye to Leaking around, easy to refillable and replace.

3 in 1 Spray Floor Mop: Adsorption,lock water,clean three in one.Coming with 3 improved thicken microfiber pads, which are are soft, absorbent, durable and reusable, more economical than disposable cleaning pads. Floor mop cloths have millions of microscopic fibers that grab dirt, dust, pet hair, crumbs and moisture and reach deep into cracks to pick up more grime than flat disposables.Therefore,EXEGO microfiber mop can be used as dry duster as well as wet mop.

Upgraded Sealed Water Bottle & Ergonomic Handle :Leave the heavy messy bucket alone, refillable spray mop come with the 440 ML Water tank, easy to sweep all of your rooms at once.The refillable bottle allows you to fill your favorite cleaning solution, and enhanced responsive trigger make spraying never been so much easier. Are you ready to shine your hardwood floors , wood, vinyl, ceramic,concrete,tile,laminate wood,floors and etc?

No bend over & relaxed your back: This dust wet mop head can rotate 360 degree, reach out any crevices and deep corner with ease such as under the sofa, bed and other furniture and every corner of your house. No bend over for the extendable pole, relaxed your back from now, make cleaning easier. Ideal for eliminating the most stubborn dirt on your wall, windows, living room, ceiling, under furniture and even corners hard to reach.

Spray Mops Packaging:The floor mops size is about 47.2 x 5.5x 15 inch and 2.35 pounds weight. Packing includes 1* floor mop, 1* water tank, 3*microfiber mop pads, 1* dirt removal scrub brush. This spray floor mop with washable mop cloth, which can be resuable and keep more money in your wallet,less waste in the trash.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EXEGO spray mop with 3x washable pads All-in-One Solution Spray Mop for House Cleaning Faster Cleaning - EXEGO Hardwood floor mop clean 2x faster with our large 15" x 5.5" mop heads,750 gram ultra lightweight body, and dirt trapping looped microfiber pads design. Light Weight - Our foam second handle,one operation squeeze trigger and 360 degree cleaning spray mop head make cleaning easy while saving you from fatigue,especially for people with arthritis,they can easily use the mop. 440ML Refillable Water Tank- with the big capacity of 640ML water tank,you can refill your favorite cleaning solution to clean your bedroom,kitchen,living room,office and so on. Deep Clean Scrub Pads - The microfiber can catch minimal dust,hair and debris,the raised edge cotton thread design which is soft to protect your furniture when you clean the gaps on the wall.Stop moving your messes around and use the deep clean scrub pads to break down and clean up those stubborn messes! Machine Washable - Wash our reusable pads up to 200 times in washer or by hand,which keep more money in your wallet,less waste in the trash.

WET MOP & DRY MOP The 360° movable spray floor mop system is extremely easy to deep cleaning and can enter hard-to-reach places,does not need to fill the bucket, but only with a refillable 440mL bottle to provide fresh cleaning solution at all times.Having arthritis prevents you from using a traditional floor mop, or bending your knees to clean the floor. This 360° rotating spray mop is the perfect solution.

Washable Mop Pads in Washer(15.7"x 6.7") The micro-fibre pad has millions of small,microscopic fibres that catch dirt,dust,hair,moisture and reach deep into cracks to pick up more dirt than flat disposable throwaway cloths.The microfibre spray mop pad is 100% machine washable and reusable,which keep more money in your wallet,less waste in the trash.our crofiber mop pads washable size is 15.7"x 6.7",which will fit almost every conventional size mop.

EXEGO spray mops for floor cleaning advantages floor mops for cleaning When your hands get wet during doing household cleaning, the anti-slip foam handle gives you a comfortable grip experience to less effort and time. Having Ergonomic handle control and rod length,all you have to do is press the handy trigger on the handle to get the cold water mist you need.By controlling the spray handle, you can also spray as little liquid as you like, making cleaning easier and more efficient. Wet mop makes floor cleaning easy and uncomplicated. No bending, no bucket. The microfiber mop handle is made of aluminium alloy and ABS material and stainless steel construction which is more sturdy,durable,lightweight than the conventional floor mop and does not loosen or break,comfortable to hold.

Upgrade Velcro Design- More Firmly The 360 degree cleaning mop comes with 3 microfiber mop pads can be tear out and stick-up repeatedly.You don’t have to worry about the cloth falling off the mop during the cleaning process because our mops for laminate floors has 6 sticking buckles than other mops which just has 4 sticking buckles.You can quickly replace your pads to wet use or dry use, making cleaning simple and efficient

Additional Scraper with Comb The microfiber spray flat mop coming with the multi-function scraper, you can press water onto the spray mop pads, remove dirt and stains on the floor / tiles. The side of the comb shape can remove hair, which makes cleaning much easier. The kitchen mop scraper can protect your hands avoid to get dirt. when you finished the cleaning job, you can put the scraper on the mop handle to avoid lost.

wet mops for floor cleaning Multipurpose Spray Mop Our microfiber mops is not only dry duster but also a wet mop to eliminates even the most stubborn dirt,oil stain,perfect to shine your hardwood, wood, vinyl, ceramic,concrete,tile,laminate wood,floors and etc.Commercial Wet Mop is also a good helper to keep your home, kitchen,bathroom,office free of dust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More durable than Swiffer
reviews.reviewText: After purchasing 3 different Swiffer Wet Jets in the last 18 months, I took a chance on this mop system. The Swiffer's battery-operated system would just stop working after 6 months, making them too disposable. Not a great plan. This microfiber spray mop works with a trigger system, like a spray bottle - no batteries! The container will hold any product(s) you want to use, making it more versitile as well. I've seen others say the bottle is too small, but it holds as much as the Swiffer does. The mop head is very plush and absorbs nicely for a quicker dry time. Does a great job of cleaning. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a life changer!
reviews.reviewText: So I bought this because I am having hand surgery and can't lug around a bucket and mop. I had no idea that this would change my life. We have a Labrador who manages to drink water like a wildebeest .....this means that every time she takes a drink there are large puddles of water everywhere!! This little mop is so easy to use that I can clean up the puddles quick and my floor looks great. I can also use it one handed.I love it so much I plan on buying a back up so I am never without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mop..but short lived.
reviews.reviewText: This mop was great! Easy to use, helped make cleaning with your choice of cleaner easy. Pads are thick, they clean well. I do wish there was a scrubber feature on the mop. I wish that it would spray upside down to better clean walls with. The downside is it broke after 1 year. They spray triguer cracked off on the inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great product
reviews.reviewText: This mop makes cleaning the floors a snap! I have vinyl plank floors and 3 dogs! I like that the mop cloths are thick and absorbent, then can be thrown in the wash when you're done. They also wash up well and come out nice and ready for the next use. The spray bottle is easy to remove for refilling, you can use any cleaning solution you choose, and it's large enough to get the whole job done. I actually like this product so much, I suggest it to clients! It certainly beats those disposable heads and pre-mixed solutions you have to keep buying! A great value for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this mop. Works great on my wood floor. Pads are easy to remove, clean or replace. Spray technique works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great refillable mop
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and refillable tank. They do not sell the bottle refills for my old shark do I got this. It’s great, including for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure it’s worth it.
reviews.reviewText: It’s cheap.. I should’ve expected that it would be very cheaply made. Broke and had to superglue a piece on the lid after only a couple uses. Serves its purpose just not sure how many uses I’ll actually get out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very welcome addition
reviews.reviewText: Always on the hunt for cleaning tools that get good reviews, and, are gray. Gray is my color scheme, and the more I like the look of my cleaning tools, the more likely I am to clean. :)Have only used it once so far, so if anything changes, I will come back and update.Nice big pad surface. To get the bottle out, pull straight back. Swivel works well. Sprayer works well. The overall feel is mostly sturdy, with a bit of "rickety" feel that they could improve upon in future upgrades. Comes with 3 pads, and I bought extra pads as well. Again, the more cleaning tools available to me, the more likely I am to clean, and clean more frequently.Very happy with purchase. :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Super easy to assemble and use
reviews.reviewText: This mop is fantastic!!!! I love it for the wet weather with the dog coming in and out of the house. You can choose your own cleaner, AND it comes with three mop cloths! Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really great addition to my cleaning regime! Easy to assemble and use works great with reusable mop heads.

Praktisch und sehr gut. Wenn zufällig ein Glas süßer Saft auf den Boden verschüttet wird ist schnell feucht aufgewischt.Bei Rücken Probleme auch praktisch.Ohne Bücken schnell aufgewischt.Klare Weiterempfehlung.

To be honest, I prefer this mop to my N*rwex mop system which is 10x the price!!! The sprayer works well, it’s easy to use and clean. Sprays well. Cleans well. Great for those quick mops to get footprints off the floor and light cleaning. Only complaint is it maybe feels a little flimsy, but time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like that it was quite easy to put together. It’s quite easy to use and mop cloth is very absorbent
